subject: for Frank and Chuck Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: That's Why!
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I was at the Stanely last month, and even there, I just announced I 
was doing a EVP session when in my room, and still didn't ask any 
questions. I brought Chip Coffey up to show him #34, and wihtout asking 
questions, the box told Chip, "you have to have this!".

 I'll ask questions, but it's rare, I prefer to just let them speak. 

 I was just trying to impress people that they know who you are, when 
you're recording, and what you're thinking--there's no limits.

 Frank-S
